meaningMnemonic: <radical>Fire</radical> in <radical>nature</radical> will <kanji>burn</kanji> down everything in its path. In nature, there are no firefighters to contain the flames, so the <kanji>blaze</kanji> will burn until nothing's left.
readingMnemonic: What is the worst thing that could <kanji>burn</kanji> in this fire? Your <reading>nen</reading>doroid (ねん) collection. You've spent a lot of time and money collecting all these cool and rare and unique nendoroids and now they've all burned in the fire.
